txt.en: 'You seem as though you boast a lust for adventure and energy to spare. I lack both these qualities; why I volunteered to rid the TBD Direction of sand-worms is beyond me! If you perform this deed in my stead and allow me to claim credit, I shall grant you my earnings. I may be a coward, but I shall not suffer any in town calling me such!'
TBD Lazy Scout has asked you to take over his task of ridding the TBD Direction of sand-worms.
TBD Lazy Scout can be found to the TBD Direction of TBD.\n\nReturn to TBD Lazy Scout to inform him you have cleared the TBD Location of as many sand-worms as you could.

'And you return with news of those pests' defeat, I trust? Excellent! Here is the coin I was promised for handling this matter, plus a few more for your secrecy, ha ha! I shall not ask such a task of you again. I am eternally done with even the promise of adventure.'
'Hail, adventurer. Have you taken care of those sand-worms in the south yet? I do not wish to hasten you along, but my friends are beginning to gossip about my capabilities.'
TBD return to lazy scout to tell him
Sand-worms can be found to the TBD Direction of TBD.\n\nTBD Lazy Scout has asked you to take over his task of ridding the TBD direction of sand-worms.
